page.title: 16SPARE TIME
page.content:
We went around Misson asking people what sort of things they did in their spare time.........
People mostly gardened,knit,read or went for walks.Often things which were mentioned were.......... Cooking,painting,cycling,shooting, youth club work,driving,fishing, looking after small children,taking dogs for walks and sewing.Often people made comments like "what spare time?". {IN OUR CLASS The children did different things in there spare time.Some liked playing football,snooker,squash,watching T.V, playing with younger brothers or sisters,taking dogs for walks,reading and going for bike rides.Quite a lot of children like playing on there computers in their spare time.
